reviewText: Played well and arrived right on time.  Thank you.

AS SEEN ON "60 MINUTES" The TRUE story of a neighborhood activist who went to war against NCIS to free a Marine falsely charged for big crimes. Based on book, DANGEROUS EVIDENCE, by Author Ellis A. Cohen who Produced his story for LIFETIME-TV.[In DVD & VHS]

THIS MOVIE WAS MUCH BETTER THAN I EXPECTED IT TO BE LYNN WHITFIELD GREAT PERFORMACE HELPS A BLACK MARINE ACCUSED OF RAPING A WHITE WOMAN WHO MISTAKE HIM FOR SOMEONE ELSE, WITH NO EVIDENCE TO SUPPORT THEIR CASE THE COURT'S KEEP HIM ANYWAY REFUSING TO LET THIS GUY GO, REFUSING TO LET THIS GUY PAY FOR A CRIME HE DIDN'T COMMIT LYNN WHITFIELD FIGHT'S TO SEE HIM FREE, GETTING SOME OF THE BEST LAWYERS INVOLED WHO ARE WHITE AND THEY WORKED UNTIL THEY GOT THIS GUY FREE A GOOD MOVIE.
